comment: Professor Knudsen has a great personality, but I would not take her again! She never posts grades and her lectures are not engaging whatsoever. She makes us do these news journals as "busy work" that have nothing to do with the material. I would rather spend time doing course work that helped prepare us for the tests.

Kate is amazing, hilarious and highly passionate. She only had a media journal which compares bias in media and had two tests and the final. She gave a 5% participation that everyone gets since she doesn't take attendance. She makes everything easy though. PowerPoint's are online and the review day she tells us what to study. Multiple choice tests!
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She is amazing and very chill about everything. The class consists of writing two case briefs, midterm, final, debate, and participation grade. Loved her. Powerpoints are posted and study them and you will do well on the final and the midterm. She is a defense attorney and she is very patient with everyone. Easy AB course. Got an A in the class!

No returned work, frequently did not teach for the whole class period, often read directly from power point, missed several classes and was late frequently. You will not know your grade until you see it on your transcript. Given these thing She was very personable, friendly, and has great sense of humor.

I personally enjoyed her class. The class was very interesting and topics were relevant to  current real-world events. She allowed the students to discuss various topics outloud and debate our opinions. Grades seem to be based on student effort. I would recommend her class to others.

She is a lawyer, very nice, really cool and kinda hot. The class is interesting and I was surprised at how much I learned. The material can be difficult and you need to do a lot of work on your own. She doesn't give grades back so you don't know how you are doing throughout the semester. Would take again

To teach, she posts a word document of her notes and quickly reads them to the class.  She doesn't post notes online, so class time is spent furiously writing so you don't miss anything, and there is little time to actually understand. Didn't get a graded assignment back all semester despite our first assignment being due Week 1. Terrible professor
